Translations.Text: He loka konatya gostici vicarapusa karita aheta
Tya mothya khabarici
Jyababata he aneka mata (vicara) rakhatata
Niscitapane he ataca januna ghetila
Punha niscitapane tyanna phara lavakara mahita padela
Kaya amhi jaminila bicha'ita nahi banavile
Ani parvatanna mekha nahi banavile
Ani amhi tumhala jodi jodine nirmana kele
Ani amhi tumacya jhopela tumacya aramace karana banavile
Ani ratrila amhi padada (avarana) banavile
Ani divasala amhi roji prapta karanyaca samaya banavile
Ani tumacya varati amhi sata majabuta akasa banavile
Ani eka cakakanara tejasvi dipa nirmana kela
Ani dhagandvare amhi musaladhara parjan'yavrsti keli
Yasathi ki tyadvare anna (dhan'ya) ani vanaspati ugavavyata
Ani ghanadata bagahi (ugavavya)
Nihsansaya, nirnayaca divasa nirdharita ahe
Jya divasi sura (sankha) phunkala ja'ila, maga tumhi sarva jhundacya jhunda banuna yala
Ani akasa ughadale ja'ila, tevha tyata dareca dare banatila
Ani parvata calavile jatila, tevha te pandhari valu banatila
Nihsansaya, jahannama tapuna basali ahe
Vidrohi (udanda) lokance thikana teca ahe
Tyata te yuganuyuge (ani satake) paduna rahatila
Na kadhi tyata sitalateci godi cakhatila, na panyaci
Garama (ukalate) pani ani vahatya pu-kherija
(Tyanna) purnapane mobadala milela
Tyanna tara hisobaci asaca navhati
Te nidaratene amacya ayatinna khote tharavita asata
Amhi pratyeka gosta lihuna suraksita thevali ahe
Ata tumhi (apalya karmanca) svada cakha. Amhi tumacya siksetaca vadhakarita rahu
Nihsansaya, allahace bhaya rakhanaryankarita saphalata ahe
Baga aheta ani drakse aheta
Ani navayuvati kumarika samavayaska striya aheta
Ani bharuna vahanare madyace pyale aheta
Tithe na tara te aslila gosti aikatila ani na khotya gosti aikatila
(Tyanna) tumacya palanakartyatarphe (tyancya satkarmanca) ha mobadala milela, jo phara mothe baksisa asela

(Tya) palanakartyatarphe milela, jo akasanca ani jaminica, ani je kahi tyancya daramyana ahe, tya sarvanca svami va palanakarta ahe, ani motha dayavana ahe. Konalahi tyacyasi bolanyaca adhikara nasela
Jya divasi ruha (atma) ani phariste ranga bandhuna ubhe asatila tevha koni bolu sakanara nahi, matra jyala atisaya dayavana (rahamana) anumati de'ila, ani to ucita gosta tondatuna kadhila (bolela)
Ha divasa satya ahe, ata jyaci iccha asela tyane apalya palanakartyajavala (satkarme karuna) sthana banavave

Amhi tumhala nikata bhavisyata ghaduna yenarya siksa yatanece bhaya dakhavile (ani savadha kele) jya divasi manusya apalya hatanni kelelya kama'i (karma) la pahila ani kaphira mhanela ki, mi mati jhalo asato tara (bare jhale asate)
Buduna kathoratapurvaka khecanaryanci sapatha
Bandhana ukaluna sodavinaryanci sapatha
Ani pohanarya phiranaryanci sapatha
Maga dhavata pudhe janaryanci sapatha
Maga karyaci yojana karanaryanci sapatha
Jya divasi tharathara kampanari tharathara kampela
Tyanantara eka mage yenari (magomaga) ye'ila
(Aneka) hrdaya tya divasi dhadadhada karatila
Jyancya najara khali asatila
Ase mhanatata ki, kaya amhala pahilyasarakhya avasthekade punha paratavile ja'ila
Kaya asa veli ki jevha amhi agadi jirnasirna hade ho'una ja'u
Mhanatata ki maga tara he paratane nukasanadayaka ahe. (Mahita asale pahije)
Ki ti tara kevala eka (bhayanaka) daradavani ahe
(Ji dili jataca) te ekadama maidanata jama hotila
Kaya, musa (alaihis'salama) ca vrttanta tumhasa pohacala ahe
Jevha tyanna tyancya palanakartyane tuvacya pavitra maidanata pukarale
(Ki) tumhi phira'aunajavala ja, tyane bandakhori (udandata) angikarali ahe
Tyala sanga ki, kaya tu svatahci durusti ani sudharana icchito
Ani he ki mi tula tujhya palanakartyaca marga dakhavu yasathi ki tu (tyace) bhaya balagu lagave
Tevha tyala mothi nisani dakhavili
Tara tyane khote tharavile ani avajna keli
Maga punha paratala prayatna karita
Maga sarvanna ekatra karuna unca svarata ailana kele
Mhanala, tumha sarvanca palanahara mica ahe
Tevha (sarvocca va sarvasrestha) allahane dekhila tyala akhirata (maranottara jivana) cya ani ya jagacya siksa - yataneta gherale
Nihsansaya, yata tya manasakarita bodha ahe, jo bhaya rakhila
Kaya tumhala nirmana karane adhika kathina ahe kinva akasala? Sarvasrestha allahane tyala nirmana kele
Tyaci unci vadhavili, maga tyala yathayogya kele
Ani tyacya ratrila andhakarapurna banavile ani tyacya divasala prakata kele
Ani tyanantara jaminila (samatala) bichavile
Tyatuna pani ani cara kadhala
Ani parvatanna (majabuta) rovale
He sarva tumacya ani tumacya janavarancya phayadyasathi (ahe)
Tara jevha te mothe sankata (kayamata) ye'ila
Jya divasi manusya apalya kelelya karmanci athavana karila
Ani (pratyeka) pahanaryacya samora jahannama ughadapane anali ja'ila
Tevha, jya (manasa) ne vidroha angikarala (asela)
Ani aihika jivanala pradhan'ya dile (asela)
(Tyace) thikana jahannamaca ahe
Tathapi, jo manusya apalya palanakartyasamora ubhe rahanyapasuna bhita rahila asela ani apalya manala iccha-abhilasampasuna rokhale asela
Tara tyace thikana jannataca ahe
Loka tumhala kayamata kevha ghaduna ye'ila ase vicaratata
Te sanganyasi tumaca kaya sambandha
Ticya jnanaci antima sima tara allahakade ahe
Tumhi tara phakta ticyasi bhayabhita rahanaryanna savadhana karanare ahata
Jya divasi he tila (pratyaksa) pahuna ghetila tevha ase vatela ki kevala divasaca antima bhaga athava arambhica bhagaca te (ya jagata) rahileta
Tyane tonda ambata kele ani tonda phiravile
(Kevala asasathi) ki tyacyajavala eka andhala ala
Tumhala kaya mahita, kadacita to sudharala asata
Kinva tyane upadesa aikala asata ani tyala upadesa labhadayaka tharala asata
(Parantu) jo beparva'ine vagato
Tyacyakade tara tumhi purepura laksa deta ahata
Vastavika tyacya na sudharanyane tumaci kahica hani nahi
Ani jo manusya tumacyajavala dhavata yeto
Ani to bhita (hi) ahe
Tara tyacyasi tumhi upeksavrtti dakhavita
He yogya nahi.1 Kura'ana tara bodha (dayaka vastu) ahe
Jyaci iccha ho'ila (tyane) yapasuna bodha ghyava
(Ha tara) adara-sanmana purna granthammadhye ahe
Je uccatama va pavitra ani svaccha sud'dha aheta
Asa lihinaryancya hatata ahe
Je ucca darjace pavitra aheta
Allahaci mara aso manavavara, kasa krtaghna ahe
Yala (allahane) konatya vastupasuna nirmana kele
(Yala) eka viryabindupasuna maga anumanavara rakhale tyala
Maga tyacyasathi marga sopa kela
Maga tyala marana dile ani maga kabarita gadale
Maga jevha iccha ho'ila, tyala jivanta karila
Mulica nahi. Tyane ataparyanta allahacya adesace palana kele nahi
Manasane apalya bhojanavara najara takali pahije
Ki amhi bharapura pani varsavile
Maga jaminila cangalya prakare phadale
Maga ticyatuna anna (dhan'ya) ugavile
Ani draksa va bhajipala
Ani jaituna va khajura
Ani ghanadata baga
Ani meve va (gavata) cara (dekhila ugavila)
Tumacya vaparakarita va phayadyakarita ani tumacya cara payancya janavarankarita
Maga jevha kana badhira karuna takanari (kayamata) ye'ila
Tya divasi manusa pala kadhila apalya bhavapasuna
Ani apalya mata va pityapasuna
Ani apalya patni va apalya santatipasuna
Tyancyapaiki pratyekala tya divasi asi cinta (laguna) rahila, ji tyala (vyasta rakhanya) sathi puresi asela
Tya divasi aneka cehare ujvala asatila
(Je) hasata ani anandita asatila
Ani bahuteka cehare tya divasi dhuline makhalele asatila
Tyancyavara kalima acchadita asela
He teca inkari, duracari loka asatila
Jevha surya gundaluna ghetala ja'ila
Ani jevha tare nisteja hotila
Ani jevha parvatanna calavile ja'ila
Ani jevha garbhadharaka sandaninna soduna dile ja'ila
Ani jevha hinsra pasunna ekatrita kele ja'ila
Ani jevha samudra bhadakavile jatila
Ani jevha prananna (sarirasi) jodale ja'ila
Ani jevha jivanta gadalya gelelya mulinna vicarale ja'ila
Ki konatya aparadhapayi tyanci hatya keli geli
Ani jevha karma-lekha ughadale jatila
Ani jevha akasaci camadi (avarana) utaravili ja'ila
Ani jevha jahannama bhadakavili ja'ila
Ani jevha jannatala javala anale ja'ila
Tevha tya divasi pratyeka manusya januna ghe'ila, je kahi (sobata) ghe'una ala asela
Mi sapatha gheto mage hatanarya
Calanarya phiranarya, lapanarya taryanci
Ani ratrici jevha ti ja'u lagela
Ani sakalaci jevha cakaku lagela
Nihsansaya, he eka sanmanita sandesavahakace kathana ahe
Jo motha saktisali ahe. Arsaca svami (allaha) cya thayi ucca darjaca ahe
Jyace tethe (akasammadhye) ajnapalana kele jate, (to) amanatadara ahe
Ani tumaca sathidara veda nahi
Tyane tya (pharistya) la akasacya ughadya kinaryavara pahilehi ahe
Ani ha paroksacya gosti sanganyata kanjusahi nahi
Ani ha (kura'ana) dhihkkaralelya saitanace kathana nahi
Maga tumhi kothe jata ahata
He tara samasta visvavasiyankarita bodhapatra ahe
(Khasakaruna tyacyasathi,) jo tumacyapaiki sarala margavara calu icchito
Ani tumhi, sarva visvancya palanakartya (allaha) cya (icche) vina kahica icchu sakata nahi
Jevha akasa vidirna ho'ila
Ani jevha tare jhadatila (galuna padatila)
Ani jevha samudra vahuna jatila
Ani jevha kabarinna (phaduna) ukhaduna takale ja'ila
Tya veli pratyeka manusya, tyane je kahi pudhe pathavile ani mage sodale (arthata apalya pudhacya magacya karmanna) januna ghe'ila
He manava! Tula apalya dayalu palanakartyababata konatya gostine bahakavile
Jya (palanakartyane) tula nirmana kele, maga yathayogya kele, maga (suyogyaritya) vyavasthita ghadavile
Jya rupata icchile tula banavile ani tula ghadavile
Mulica nahi, kimbahuna tumhi tara siksa ani mobadalyacya divasala khote tharavita
Nihsansaya, tumacyavara raksaka (paharekari)
Sanmanita lihinare niyukta aheta
Je kahi tumhi karata, te janatata
Nihsansaya, neka - sadacari loka (jannatace aisa'arama ani) denagyanni labhanvita asatila
Ani niscitaca va'ita (duracari) loka jahannamamadhye asatila
Mobadalyacya divasi ticyata pravesa karatila
Te ticyatuna kadhihi gayaba ho'u sakanara nahita
Ani tumhala kahi mahitahi ahe ki mobadalyaca divasa kaya ahe
Mi dusaryanda (sangato ki) tumhala kaya mahita ki mobadalyaca (ani sikseca) divasa kaya ahe
(To asa ki) jya divasi koni manusya, kona manasakarita kasalyahi gostica adhikara balaganara nasela ani samasta adesa tya divasi allahaceca asatila
Mothi va'ita avastha ahe mapa-tolamadhye kami karanaryansathi
Ki jevha lokankaduna mapa mojuna ghetata tevha purepura mojuna ghetata
Ani jevha tyanna mapa mojuna kinva tola karuna detata, tevha kami detata
Kaya tyanna apalya mrtyunantara jivanta ho'una uthanyababataca visvasa nahi
Tya mahana divasakarita
Jya divasi sarva loka, sarva visvancya palanakartyasamora ubhe asatila
Nihsansaya, duracari lokanca karma-lekha ‘sijjina’ madhye ahe
Tumhala kaya mahita ‘sijjina’ kaya ahe
(Ha tara) likhita grantha ahe
Tya divasi khote uthavinaryanci mothi durdasa ahe
Je mobadala ani siksecya divasala khote tharavitata
Yala phakta toca khote tharavito, jo maryadece ullanghana karanara ani aparadhi asato
Jevha tyacyasamora amacya ayati vacalya jatata tevha to mhanato ki he tara purvicya lokance kis'se aheta
Ase nahi, kimbahuna tyancya manavara tyancya karmammule ganja (cadhalela) ahe
Evadheca nahi. He loka tya divasi apalya palanakartyacya darsanapasuna vancita thevale jatila
Maga ya lokanna niscitapane jahannamamadhye phekuna dile ja'ila
Maga tyanna sangitale ja'ila ki heca ahe te, jyala tumhi khote tharavita rahile
Nihsansaya, satkarmi lokanca karma-lekha ‘illiyina’ madhye ahe
Tumhala kaya mahita ki ‘illiyina’ kaya ahe
(To tara) likhita grantha ahe
Allahace nikatavarti (phariste) hajara asatata
Nihsansaya, neka sadacari loka (mothya) sukha-samadhanata asatila
Asananvara basuna pahata asatila
Tumhi tyancya ceharyavarunaca (allahacya) krpa denagyanci praphullata olakhala
Ya lokanna sud'dha nirbhela madya pajale ja'ila
Jyavara kasturici mohara lagali asela. Iccha karanaryanni tyacica iccha keli pahije
Ani tyata ‘tasnima’ce misrana asela
(Arthata) to jhara, jyace pani, allahace sannidhya labhalele loka pitila
Nihsansaya, aparadhi loka imana rakhanarya lokanci thatta udavita asata
Ani tyancya javaluna jatana netra kataksa (va isaryane) tyaca apamana karita asata
Ani jevha apalya lokankade parata yeta, tevha thatta - maskari karita asata
Ani jevha tyanna pahata, tevha ase mhanata, niscitaca he loka vata cukalele aheta
Yanna, tyacyavara niriksaka banavuna tara nahi pathavile gele
Tevha aja imana rakhanare ya inkari lokanvara hasatila
Asananvara virajamana ho'una pahata asatila
Ki ata ya inkara karanaryanni, jase karma te karita hote, tyaca purepura mobadala prapta karuna ghetala
Jevha akasa vidirna ho'ila
Ani apalya palanakartyaca adesa kana lavuna aikela, ani tyala tase karane bhaga ahe
Ani jevha jaminila (khecuna) pasaravile ja'ila
Ani ticyata je ahe te okuna bahera kadhila ani agadi khali ho'ila
Ani apalya palanakartyaca adesa kana lavuna aikela ani ti tyasa patra ahe
He manava! Tu apalya palanakartyasi bheta ho'iparyanta he prayatna ani sarva karya ani parisrama karuna tyaci bheta ghenara ahesa
Tara tya veli jya manasacya ujavya hatata karma-patra dile ja'ila
Tyaca hisoba mothya sahajatene ghetala ja'ila
Ani to apalya kutumbiyankade anandita ho'una parata ja'ila
Parantu jya manasace karma-patra tyacya pathimaguna dile ja'ila
Tevha to mrtyula bolavu lagela
Ani bhadakatya jahannamamadhye dakhala ho'ila
Ha manusya apalya kutumbata (jagata) anandita hota
To samajata hota ki allahakade paratuna janaraca nahi
He kase sakya ahe, vastavika tyaca palanakarta tyala cangalya prakare pahata hota
Mala sandhyakalacya lalimeci sapatha
Ani ratrici ani tine gola kelelya vastunci sapatha
Ani purna candraci sapatha
Nihsansaya, tumhi eka avasthetuna dusarya avastheta pohocala
Tyanna jhale tari kaya ki imana rakhata nahita
Ani jevha tyancyasamora kura'ana vacale jate, tevha sajada karita nahita
Kimbahuna tyanni kupra (inkara) kela, te khote tharavita aheta
Ani he je kahi manata thevatata, allaha te cangalya prakare janato
Tevha tumhi tyanna duhkhadayaka siksa yatananci khusakhabara dya
Tathapi imana rakhanarya neka sadacari lokanna aganita ani kadhihi na sampanara mobadala pradana kela ja'ila
Burujanvalya akasaci sapatha
Vayada kelelya divasaci sapatha
Hajara honarya ani hajara kelya gelelyaci sapatha
(Ki) khandakavalyanca sarvanasa kela gela
Ti eka aga hoti indhanaci
Jevha te loka ticya javalapasa basale hote
Ani imanadharakansi je karita hote, te apalya samora pahata hote
He loka tya imanadharakancya an'ya ekhadya aparadhaca suda gheta navhate, yakherija ki tyanni varcasvasali, sarva prasansesa patra asa allahavara imana rakhale hote
Jyacyasathi akasa ani dharatice samrajya va rajyasatta ahe ani pratyeka vastu sarvasrestha allahasamora ahe
Nihsansaya, jya lokanni imanadharaka purusanna va striyanna satavile, maga maphihi magitali nahi tara tyancyasathi jahannamaci siksa-yatana ahe ani jalanyaci siksa
Nihsansaya, imana kabula karanaryankarita ani satkarma karanaryankarita tya baga ahe, jyancya khali pravaha vahata aheta. Hica mothi saphalata ahe
Nihsansaya, tumacya palanakartyaci pakada mothi sakta ahe
Toca pahilyanda nirmana karato ani toca dusaryanda jivanta karila
To motha mapha karanara ani khupa sneha-prema karanara ahe
Arsaca svami, atyadhika mahanata rakhanara
Je icchila te karuna takanara ahe
Kaya tumhala laskaranci batamihi milali ahe
(Arthata) phira'auna ani samudaci
Khare tara he inkari loka khote tharavinyacyaca mage lagale aheta
Ani sarvasrestha allahanehi tyanna sagalikaduna gherale ahe
Kimbahuna ha kura'ana mothi sana vaibhava (prasansa) rakhanara ahe
‘Lohe mahaphuja’madhye (lihilela)
Sapatha ahe akasaci ani andharata prakata honaryaci
Tumhala kaya mahita ki to ratri prakata honara kaya ahe
To eka tejasvi tara ahe
Asa konihi nahi, jyacyavara sanraksaka pharista (niyukta) nasela
Manasane vicara kela pahije ki tyala konatya vastupasuna nirmana kele gele ahe
Tyala eka usalatya panyapasuna nirmana kele gele ahe
Je patha ani chati yancya daramyani bhagatuna nighate
Nihsansaya, to (allaha) tyala parata ananyavara niscitaca samarthya rakhanara ahe
Jya divasi gupta rahasyabhedanci janca-padatala keli ja'ila
Tevha tyaca na kahi jora calela ani na koni madatakarta asela
Parjan'yavrsti karanarya akasaci sapatha
Ani dubhanganarya jaminici sapatha
Nihsansaya, ha (kura'ana) katekora phaisala karanari bhasa ahe
Hi hasya-vinodaci (ani nirarthaka) gosta nahi
Tathapi inkari loka kata - karasthana karita aheta
Ani mi dekhila eka dava calata ahe
Tumhi ya inkari lokanna savada de'una taka, tyanna kahi divasa mokalika dya
Apalya ati ucca palanakartyacya navaci pavitrata varnana kara
Jyane nirmana kele ani sahi salamata banavile
Ani jyane (yathayogya) anumana kele ani maga margadarsana kele
Ani jyane taje gavata ugavile
Maga tyane te (sukavuna) kala kera - kacara karuna takale
Amhi tumhala sikavu, maga tumhi visaranara nahi
Parantu je kahi allaha icchila. Nihsansaya, to ughada ani lapalele sarva kahi janato
Ani amhi tumacyasathi sahajata nirmana karu
Tevha tumhi upadesa karita raha jara upadesa kahi labha de'ila
(Allahace) bhaya balaganara tara bodha grahana karila
Tathapi durdaivi, yapasuna dura palela
Jo mothya bhayankara agita dakhala ho'ila
Jithe maga to na marela, na jagela, (kimbahuna maranasanna sthititaca paduna rahila)
Nihsansaya, tyane saphalata prapta keli, jo svaccha sud'dha jhala
Ani jyane apalya palanakartyace nama smaranata thevale, ani namaja padhata rahila
Parantu tumhi tara aihika jivanalaca pradhan'ya deta
Ani akhirata (maranottara jivana) atisaya uttama nirantara tikuna rahanari ahe
Ya gostice varnana purvi (avatarita jhalelya) granthatahi ahe
(Arthata) ibrahima ani musa yancya granthata
Kaya tumhalahi, jhakuna takanarya (kayamata) ci varta pohacali ahe
Tya divasi bahuteka cehare apamanita asatila
(Ani) duhkhanni pidita kasta - yatanagrasta asatila
Te dhagadhagatya agita ja'una padatila
Ani atisaya usna jharyace pani tyanna pajale ja'ila
Tyancyasathi katedara jhadankherija anakhi kahi khayala nasela
Je na tyanna dhasta pusta karila, na tyanci bhuka mitavila
Bahuteka cehare tya divasi praphulla tavatavita ani (susampanna sthitita) asatila
Apalya karmammule anandita asatila
Ucca (praticya) jannatimmadhye asatila
Jithe konatihi asabhya nirarthaka gosta aikanara nahita
Jithe (sitala) jhare vahata asatila
(Ani) tya (jannatim) madhye unca unca asane asatila
Ani pyale thevalele (asatila)
Ani eka rangeta lavalele takke asatila
Ani ma'u makhamali galice pasaralele asatila
Kaya he untakade nahi pahata ki tyanna kasa prakare nirmana kele gele ahe
Ani akasanna ki kasa prakare unca kele gele ahe
Ani parvatankade, ki kasa prakare gadale gele aheta
Ani jaminikade ki kasa prakare ti bichavili geli ahe
Tara tumhi upadesa karita raha (karana) tumhi phakta upadesa karanare ahata
Tumhi kahi yancyavara dekharekha thevanare nahita
Parantu jo manusya tonda phiravila ani inkara karila
Tyala sarvasrestha allaha phara motha azaba (siksa - yatana) de'ila
Nihsansaya, tyanna tara amacyacakade paratayace ahe
Nihsansaya, tyanca hisoba ghenyaci jababadari amaci ahe
Sapatha ahe pratahkalaci
Ani daha ratrinci
Ani sama ani visama sankhyeci
Ani ratrici jevha ti nighu lagavi
Kaya yata bud'dhimanansathi puresi sapatha ahe
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki tumacya palanakartyane adacya lokansi kaya vyavahara kela
Mothamothe khamba banavinarya iramasi
Jyancyasarakha (konatahi janasamuha) an'ya bhubhagata nirmana kela gela nahi
Ani samudacya lokansi, jyanni darya-khoryata mothamothe pasana korale hote
Ani phira'aunasi, jo mekha balaganara hota
Ya sarvanni dharativara upadrava pasaravila hota
Ani khupa utpata (phasada) majavila hota
Sevati tumacya palanakartyane ya sarvanvara azabaca asuda barasavila
Nihsansaya, tumaca palanakarta laksa thevuna ahe
Manasa (ci hi dasa ahe ki) jevha tyaca palanakarta tyaci pariksa gheto, ani tyala mana pratistha va krpa denagya pradana karato tevha to mhanu lagato ki majhya palanakartyane mala sanmanita kele
Ani jevha to (allaha) yaci kasoti gheto, tyaci ajivika tanga (kami) karuna takato, tevha to mhanu lagato ki majhya palanakartyane majhi avhelana keli (ani mala apamanita kele)
Ase mulica nahi kimbahuna (khari gosta asi) ki tumhi loka anathaca mana-sanmana rakhata nahi
Ani garibanna jevu ghalanyace ekamekanna protsahana deta nahi
Ani (melelyanci) varasa sampatti gola karuna khatata
Ani dhana-sampattisi jivanapada prema rakhata
Nihsansaya, jaminila jevha kuthuna kuthuna tila agadi sapata kele ja'ila
Ani tumaca palanakarta (svatah) prakata ho'ila ani phariste ranga bandhuna (yetila)
Ani jya divasi jahannamalahi anale ja'ila tya divasi manusa bodha grahana karila. Parantu ata tyacya bodha grahana karanyaca kaya labha
To mhanela ki mi apalya ya jivanakarita kahi satkarme, pahilyapasuna karuna thevali asati tara phara bare jhale asate
Tara aja allahacya siksa - yatanesarakhi siksa - yatana an'ya konacihi nasela
Na tyacya bandhanasarakhe konace bandhana asela
He santusta atma
Tu apalya palanakartyakade parata cala, asa avastheta ki tu tyacyasi raji, to tujhyasi prasanna
Tevha, majhya khasa dasammadhye samila ho
Ani majhya jannatamadhye pravesa kara
Mi ya saharaci sapatha gheto
Ani tumhi ya saharata vastavya karata
Ani (sapatha ahe) manavi pita ani santatici
Nihsansaya, amhi manavala (mothya) kasta-yataneta nirmana kele
Kaya manusya ase samajato ki to konacya niyantranakhali nahi
Sangata (phirato) ki mi tara bharapura dhana-sampatti kharca karuna takali
Kaya, to (ase) samajato ki koni tyala pahileca nahi
Kaya, amhi tyace dona dole nahi banavile
Ani eka jibha va dona otha (nahi banavile)
Ani tyala donhi marga dakhavuna dile
Tevha, ghatita pravesa karane tyala sakya jhale nahi
Tumhala kaya mahita ki to ghati marga kaya ahe
Ekhadyaci mana (dasa, dasi) mukta karane
Kinva bhukelya divasi potabhara jevu ghalane
Ekhadya nateva'ika anathala
Kinva matisa milalelya atisaya gariba manasala
Maga tya lokampaiki jhala asata, je imana rakhatata, ani ekamekanna dhira sanyama va daya karuna karanyaci takida karatata
Heca loka aheta ujavya bajuce
Ani jya lokanni amacya ayatinca inkara kela, teca loka davya hatace aheta
Heca agicya kondita asatila ji cari bajunni gheraleli asela
Sapatha ahe suryaci ani tyacya unhaci
Sapatha ahe candraci jevha tyacya mage ye'ila
Sapatha ahe divasaci jevha suryala prakata karila
Sapatha ahe ratrici jevha tyala jhakuna takila
Sapatha ahe akasaci ani tyala banavinyaci
Sapatha ahe jaminici ani tila samatala karanyaci
Sapatha ahe prana (atmya) ci ani tyala yogya banavinyaci
Maga samaja dili tyala duracaraci ani tyapasuna alipta rahanyaci
Jyane ya (atmya) la svaccha sud'dha kele, to saphala jhala
Ani jyane yala matita milavale to asaphala jhala
Samuda janasamuhane apalya vidrohamule khote tharavile
Jevha tyancyatala eka motha abhagi uthuna ubha rahila
Tyanna allahacya paigambarane pharmavile hote ki sarvasrestha allahacya sandanice ani ticya pinyacya palice (raksana kara)

Tya lokanni apalya paigambaranna khote januna tya sandanila maruna takale. Tevha tyancya palanakartyane tyancya aparadhapayi tyanna vinasata takale ani maga vinasala sarvatrika kele ani tya sampurna vastila bhu'isapata karuna takale
To ya prakopacya parinamapasuna nirbhaya ahe
Sapatha ahe ratrici jevha ti pasarate
Ani sapatha ahe divasaci jevha to prakasamana hoto
Ani sapatha ahe tyaci jyane nara va madi nirmana kele
Nihsansaya, tumace prayatna vegavegalya prakarace aheta
Tara jo (allahacya margata) deta rahila ani bhaya balagata rahila
Ani bhala'ipurna gostice satya-samarthana karita rahila
Tara amhihi tyala sahaja sulabhata pradana karu
Parantu jyane kanjusi keli ani beparva'i dakhavili
Ani satkarmacya gostinna khote tharavile
Tara amhihi tyacyasathi tangi adacanici samugri upalabdha karu
Tyaci dhana-sampatti tyala (tondaghasi) padateveli kahica upayogi padanara nahi
Nihsansaya, marga dakhavinyaci jababadari amaci ahe
Ani amacyaca hati akhirata ani hi duniya ahe
Mi tara tumhala angare(nikhare) maranarya agipasuna bhayabhita kele ahe
Jicyata phakta toca kamanasibi dakhala ho'ila
Jyane khote tharavile ani (yace anusarana karanyapasuna) tonda phiravile
Ani ya (agi) pasuna asa manusya dura thevala ja'ila, jo allahace mothe bhaya rakhuna vaganara asela
Jo svaccha sud'dhata (paki) prapta karanyasathi apale dhana deto
Konaca tyacyavara kahi upakara nahi ki jyaci pheda keli jata asavi
Kimbahuna, kevala apalya ati'ucca va sarvasrestha palanakartyaci prasannata prapta karanyakarita
Nihsansaya, to (allaha dekhila) lavakaraca raji ho'ila
Sapatha ahe casta (surya vara alya) cya veleci
Ani sapatha ahe ratrici jevha ti pasarate
Na tara tumacya palanakartyane tumhala (ekate) sodale ahe, ani na to tumacyasi bejara jhala ahe
Nihsansaya, tumacyasathi arambhapeksa sevata adhika cangala ahe
Tumhala tumaca palanakarta phara lavakaraca (inama) de'ila ani tumhi raji (va khusa) vhala
Kaya tyane tumhala anatha januna asraya dila nahi
Ani tumhala, marga visaralele pahuna marga dakhavila nahi
Ani tumhala nirdhana asalele pahuna srimanta banavile nahi
Tevha anathavara tumhihi sakti (kathorata) karu naka
Ani na yacana karanaryala datuna daradavuna bolu naka
Ani apalya palanakartyacya krpa-denagyance varnana karita raha
Kaya amhi tumaci chati (hrdaya) ughada keli nahi
Ani tumacyavaruna tumace ojhe utaravile
Jyane tumaci patha moduna takali hoti
Ani amhi tumaci carca bulanda keli
Tevha niscitaca kathinatesaha sahajata ahe
Nihsansaya, kathinatesaha sahajata ahe
Tara, jevha tumhi kamakaja atopuna mokale vhala, tara tevha (upasaneta) magna vha
Ani apalya palanakartyakade mana lava
Sapatha ahe anjiraci ani jaitunaci
Ani sanayicya tura (parvata) ci
Ani ya santipurna saharaci
Nihsansaya, amhi manavala ati uttama svarupata nirmana kele
Maga tyala khalacya starampeksa khalacya staraca karuna takale
Parantu jya lokanni imana rakhale ani maga satkarma karita rahile tara tyancyasathi asa cangala mobadala ahe jokadhi sampanara nahi
Maga tumhala ata, mobadalyacya divasala khote tharavinyasa konati gosta pravrtta karate
Kaya sarvasrestha allaha (sarva) sasakanca sasaka nahi
Pathana kara apalya palanakartyacya navane, jyane nirmana kele
Jyane manavala raktacya lothadya (golya) pasuna nirmana kele
Tumhi pathana karita raha tumaca palanakarta motha krpasila ahe
Jyane lekhanidvare (jnana) sikavile
Jyane manasala te sikavile, je to janata navhata
Kharokhara manusya tara svatahvara kabu thevata nahi
Asasathi ki to svatahla niscinta (kinva srimanta) samajato
Nihsansaya, tumacya palanakartyakadeca parata jayace ahe
(Bare) tyalahi tumhi pahile, jo (eka dasala) rokhato
Vastivaka to dasa namaja ada karato
Ata tumhica sanga jara to sanmargavara asela
Kinva allahace bhaya rakhuna vaganyaca adesa deta asela
Bare paha tara, jara ha khote tharavita asela ani tonda phiravita asela
Kaya ha he nahi janata ki sarvasrestha allaha tyala cangalya prakare pahata ahe
Niscitaca, jara tyane apale va'ita vartana sodale nahi tara amhi tyacya mathyavarace kesa dharuna tyala pharaphatata odhu
Asa matha jo khota va gunhegara ahe
Tyane apalya baithakitalya lokanna bolavuna ghyave
Amhihi jahannamacya raksakanna bolavuna ghe'u
Khabaradara! Tyace mhanane mulica man'ya karu naka ani sajada kara va (allahasi) nikata vha
Nihsansaya, amhi ya (kura'ana) la kadra (barakati) cya ratri avatarita kele
Tumhala kaya mahita ki kadraci ratra kaya ahe
Kadraci ratra eka hajara mahin'yampeksa uttama ahe
Ya ratri (pratyeka karya para padanyasa) apalya palanakartyacya adesane phariste ani ruha (jibrila) avatarita hotata
Hi ratra purnapane salamatici asate ani pratahkalaca udaya (pahata) ho'iparyanta asate
Granthadharakampaiki inkara karanare ani anekesvaravadi loka apalya vartanapasuna mage hatanare navhate, joparyanta tyancyajavala ughada pramana na yave (ani te pramana he hote ki)
Sarvasrestha allahaca eka paigambara, jo pavitra grantha vacuna dakhavila
Jyata ucita va spasta isa'adesa asaveta
Granthadharaka apalyajavala spasta pramana ye'una pohacalyanantaraca (matabhedata paduna) vibhajita jhale

Vastavika tyanna yakherija konatahi adesa dila gela nahi ki tyanni phakta allahacica upasana karavi, tyacyacakarita dina (dharma) la visud'dha rakhave. (Ibrahima) haniphacya dina (dharma) vara ani namajala kayama rakhave ani jakata (kartavya-dana) deta rahave. Haca sarala dina (dharma) ahe muslima sampradayaca
Nihsansaya, je loka granthadharakampaiki inkari jhale. Ani anekesvaravadi, sarvacya sarva jahannamacya agita (jatila), jyata te nehami (nehami) rahatila. Heca loka sarvanta va'ita nirmiti hoya
Nihsansaya, jya lokanni imana rakhale ani satkarma kele, tara ase loka (allahaci) sarvanta uttama nirmiti hoya

Yanca mobadala, tyancya palanakartyajavala nirantara rahanarya jannati aheta, jyancya khali (thanda panyace) pravaha vahata asatila, jyata te sadaivakala rahatila. Sarvasrestha allaha tyancyasi raji jhala, ani he tyacyasi raji jhale. He (kevala asa manasakarita ahe jo apalya palanakartyace bhaya rakhato)
Jevha jaminila purnapane tharathara halavile ja'ila
Ani ti apalyata asalele sarva ojhe bahera kadhuna phekela
Manusya mhanu lagela ki hila jhale tari kaya
Tya divasi jamina apala sarva ahavala sadara karila
Yasathi ki tumacya palanakartyane tila tasa adesa dila asela
Tya divasi loka vegavegalya jamati banuna (parata) phiratila yasathi ki tyanna tyanci karme dakhavili javita
Tevha, jyane kana'itakehi satkarma kele asela, to te pahila
Ani jyane kana'itakehi duskarma kele asela, to te pahila
Dhapa takita dhavanarya ghodyanci sapatha
Maga tapa maruna cingarya udavinaryanci sapatha
Maga sakalacya veli halla cadhavinaryanci sapatha
Tara tya veli dhula udavitata
Maga tyacasobata sain'yammadhye ghusatata
Nihsansaya, manusya apalya palanakartyasi motha krtaghna ahe
Ani khatrine to svatahhi yavara saksi ahe
Ani ha dhanacya mohatahi motha sakta (kathora) ahe
Kaya yala ti vela mahita nahi jevha kabarimadhye je (kahi) ahe, kadhuna ghetale ja'ila
Ani manatalya gupta gostinna ughada kele ja'ila
Nihsansaya, yanca palanakarta tya divasi yancya avastheci purepura khabara rakhanara asela
Khadakhadavinari
Kaya ahe ti khadakhadavinari
Tumhala kaya mahita ki ti khadakhadavinari kaya ahe
Jya divasi manase itastatah vikhuralelya kitaka patangampramane hotila
Ani parvata, pinjalelya rangita lokarisarakhe hotila
Maga jyace parade vajanata bhari asela
Tara to aisa-aramacya jivanata asela
Ani jyace parade vajanata halake asela
Tara tyace thikana ‘haviya’ ahe
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki ti kaya ahe
Ti khupa prakharatene bhadakata asaleli aga ahe
Jastita jasta milavinyacya mohane tumhala gaphila karuna takale
Yetheparyarnta ki tumhi kabrastanata ja'una pohocale (daphana jhale)
Mulica nahi, tumhi lavakaraca januna ghyala
Mulica nahi, tumhala phara lavakara kaluna ye'ila
Mulica nahi, jara tumhi khatrisirapane januna ghyala
Tara niscitaca tumhi jahannama jarura pahala
Ani tumhi tila visvasacya dolyanni pahala
Maga tya divasi tumhala niscitapane krpa denagyambabata vicarale ja'ila
Kalaci sapatha
Vastuta sare manava purnatah ghatyata aheta
Matra tya lokankherija, jyanni imana rakhale ani satkarma karita rahile ani (jyanni) apasata satyavara kayama rahanyaci takida keli ani ekamekanna dhira sanyama rakhanyaca upadesa kela
Mothi va'ita avastha ahe asa tya pratyeka manasaci jo vyanga dosa sodhanara, cahadi karanara asela
Jo dhana - daulata ekatra karato ani mojuna thevato
To ase samajato ki tyaci dhana - daulata tyancyajavala sada sarvakala rahila
Mulica nahi. Ha tara curada karuna takanarya agita phekala ja'ila
Ani tumhala kaya mahita ki asi aga kaya asela
Ti allahane petavileli aga asela
Ji hrdayanvara cadhataca ja'ila
(Ti aga) sagalikaduna bandista asela
Ani tyancyavara mothamothya khambammadhye
Kaya tumhi nahi pahile ki tumacya palanakartyane hattivalyansi kasa vyavahara kela
Kaya tyanca dava asaphala nahi kela
Ani tyancyavara paksyancya jhundivara jhundi pathavilya
Je tyancyavara mati ani dagadancya khadyanca mara karita hote
Maga tyanna kha'una takalelya bhusa (cothya) pramane karuna takale
Kuraisala asakti milavuna denyakarita
(Arthata) tyanna sardi va garamicya pravasaci savaya lavuna denyakarita
Tyanni (krtajnata mhanuna) ya gharacya (kabagrhacya) svamici upasana karita rahile pahije
Jyane tyanna bhukelya avastheta khayala dile ani bhaya-dahasaticya avastheta santi (suraksa) pradana keli
Kaya tumhi (tyalahi) pahile jo mobadalyacya divasala khote tharavito
Haca to hoya, jo anathala dhakke marato
Ani garibala jevu ghalanyasa protsahana deta nahi
Tya namaji lokankarita ‘vaila’ (namaka jahannamaci eka jaga) ahe
Je apalya namajampasuna gaphila aheta
Je kevala dekhava dakhavitata
Ani vaparanyaci vastu rokhuna dharatata
Nihsansaya, amhi tumhala kausara (ani bareca kahi) pradana kele ahe
Tevha, tumhi apalya palanakartyasathi namaja padha ani kurbani kara
Nihsansaya, tumaca satruca bevarasi ani nava-nisana nasalela ahe
Tumhi sanguna taka ki he inkari lokanno
Na mi upasana karato tyaci, jyaci tumhi upasana karata
Na tumhi upasana karanare ahata tyaci, jyaci mi upasana karato
Ani na mi upasana karena tyaci, jyaci tumhi upasana karata
Ani na tumhi tyaci upasana karala, jyaci mi upasana karato
Tumacyasathi tumaca dina (dharma) ahe ani majhyasathi majha dina (dharma) ahe
Jevha allahatarphe madata ani vijaya prapta ho'ila
Ani lokanna tumhi allahacya dina (dharma) kade samuhasamuhanni yetana pahala
Tevha apalya palanakartyaci stuti prasansesaha pavitrata varnana karu laga ani tyacyajavala ksama yacaneci prarthana karita raha. Nihsansaya, to motha tauba (ksama-yacana) kabula karanara ahe
Abu lahabace donhi hata tutale ani to (svatah) nasta jhala
Na tara tyaci sampatti tyacya kami ali ani na tyaci kama'i
Lavakaraca to bhadakanarya agita ja'una padela
Ani tyaci patnihi (ja'ila), ji lakade vahuna nenari ahe
Ticya galyata khajuricya salica pila ghatalela dorakhanda asela
Tumhi sanga ki to allaha ekameva ahe
Allaha nirapeksa ahe
Na tyacyapasuna koni janmasa ala na to konapasuna janmala
Ani na koni tyaca samakaksa ahe
Tumhi sanga ki mi pratahkalacya svamicya saranata yeto
Tya pratyeka vastucya upadravapasuna ji tyane nirmana keli ahe
Ani andharamaya ratricya upadravapasuna, jevha tica andhara pasarela
Ani gathi (bandhuna tya) vara phunkanarincya upadravapasuna (hi)
Ani irsya karanaryancya upadravapasunahi, jevha te irsya karatila
Tumhi sanga, mi lokancya palanakartyacya saranata yeto
Lokancya svamicya (ani)
Lokancya upasya (allaha) cya (asrayata)
(Manata) kuvicara takanarya, mage hatanaryacya upadravapasuna
Jo lokancya manata va'ita vicara takato
(Maga to) jinnampaiki aso kinva manasampaiki
